original_text: Then Moses made Israel set out from the Red Sea, and they went into the wilderness of Shur. They went three days in the wilderness and found no water.
korean_text: 모세가 홍해에서 이스라엘을 인도하매 그들이 나와서 수르 광야로 들어가서 거기서 사흘길을 걸었으나 물을 얻지 못하고

sentences.original_text: Then Moses made Israel set out from the Red Sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세는 이스라엘이 홍해에서 떠나게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they went into the wilderness of Shur.
They went three days in the wilderness
